label: Corridors
description: Corridors connect those hubs.  In marine and estuarine areas, corridors connect those hubs within broad marine mammal movement areas.

label: Hubs
description: In inland areas, hubs are large patches (~5,000+ acres) of highest priority Blueprint areas and/or protected lands.  In marine and estuarine areas, hubs are large estuaries and large patches (~5,000+ acres) of highest priority Blueprint areas.
